articles.author: Chanel Georgina
articles.title: Diabetes type 2 symptoms: The texture of your hand is a sign of high blood sugar - Express
articles.description: DIABETES - do you have it? If you'd like to know whether or not you're suffering from elevated blood sugar levels, take a look at your hand. According to the American Academy of Dermatology Association (AAD), the condition can cause skin irregularities.
